headline: Expand Energy (EXE): Rethinking Valuation After a Strong Year of Market-Beating Returns
summary: Expand Energy (EXE) has quietly put up a strong stretch of returns, with the stock gaining about 12% over the past month and roughly 31% over the past year, outpacing many energy peers. See our latest analysis for Expand Energy. The rebrand from Chesapeake to Expand Energy and its sharper focus on shale assets seem to be resonating with investors. The latest share price of $122.86 and a steadily improving 1 year total shareholder return signal building momentum rather than a one off spike. If...
